metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for the mother of a scared child, standing next to the circus beasts cages. The beasts are quite scary.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug Book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. The kid and her mom are by the caged animals near dribbles.

0.speaker: Asumi
0.text: I want to go, but if I don't let her majesty here see Dribbles for the third time, I'll never hear the end of it. Kids, right?
0.context: NodeContext: sigh at the beginning, but affection in her voice

1.speaker: Asumi
1.text: Hey, maybe steer clear of the beasties? One of them is near rabid, and the other is looking at us like we're supper.

2.speaker: Asumi
2.text: I have no idea what in the hells happened back there, but I know me and my kid are standing because of you. Thank you.
2.context: NodeContext: shaken up but grateful (they survived an attack because of the player)

3.speaker: Asumi
3.text: Gods, if you hadn't been here... well, it doesn't bear thinking about.
3.context: NodeContext: shaken up but grateful (they survived an attack because of the player)
